titleStmt.title: The case of our English wool, and the manufacture thereof truly stated. Together with some of the causes of the low price of the one, and decaying condition of the other. As also the presentment of the grand jury of the county of Sommerset thereon. / Humbly offered to the High Court of Parliament.
